home.name: Warren Jaftha
home.title: Full Stack Developer
home.description: Specializes in Web design, mobile applications and social media

about.title: ABOUT
about.description1: Hello, Im Warren Jaftha, a 22-year-old enthuisiast with an unwavering love for programming.
about.description2: Ever since I was a kid, i've been captivated by the world of technology and the power of code.
about.description3: Its remarkable how lines of code can transform abstract ideas into tangible, functional software.
about.description4: My journey into programming began with simple scripts and gradually evolved into complex applications.
about.description5: I believe that programming is a creative outlet where I can turn my imagination into reality.
about.description6: Whether its developing web applications, crafting mobile apps, or even diving into data analysis.
about.description7: I relish the opportunity to solve problems and build innovative solution using the language of code.

education.description: B-Tech in Information and Communication Technology:Application Development
Diploma in Information,Communication and Technology:Application Development
High Certificate in Information,Communication and Technology

skills.title: HTML
skills.experience: I have been coding in HTML since 2019 all the way to 2023. I have coded multiple websites ranging from simple landing pages all the way to login and registration pages. As you will see by my projects I have coded an entire fully functioning Razor website using html,css and javascript.

skills.title: CSS
skills.experience: I am proficient in CSS, I am adept in leveraging its various properties and techniques to style and design web elements effectively.

skills.title: Javascript
skills.experience: I have been coding using Javascript since 2019-2023 using it to provide functionality to websites. The places where I most often used javascript was usually with login and registration pages and when having to interact with databases.

skills.title: Java
skills.experience: I have been specializing with coding in Java since 2020-2023. I have coded front-end user interfaces using Java and entire fully functioning Database Management Systems. I also have experience with coding APIs.

skills.title: Kotlin
skills.experience: I have been coding in kotlin since 2021 as I chose it as an elective in my 3rd year of university. I have coded multiple applications ranging from simple mobile applications to complex ones that required data bases and authentication.

skills.title: SQL
skills.experience: I have been learning how to create, read, update and delete databases since my first year of university which was in the year 2019 all the way to the present which is 2024.

hobbies.title: EXERCISING
hobbies.experience: I believe that fitness should be a big part of everyones life. I have been exercising and keeping healthy since 2019 and I have to say that is the best decision I have made for my life.

hobbies.title: GAMING
hobbies.experience: Gaming is a big part of my life and it is one of my main ways in which i relief any stress that I am facing in my day to day life and it is a good way to forge new relationships and make friends

hobbies.title: CYBER SECURITY
hobbies.experience: I have always had a great interest in Cyber Security since my high school days and as of current I am busy completing a 2 month Cyber Security course to further my knowledge in this field that I am so passionate about

badges.title: CISCO OPERATING SYSTEM BASICS
badges.experience: In the course I have obtained fundamental knowledge of operating systems by covering the basic concepts and skills needed to explain the purpose and characteristics of operating systems, implement basic operating system security, and explain how to configure mobile device network connectivity and email.

workExperience.description: Developed Commerce Website along side a development team named DigiSail.

testimonials.title: PEER REVIEWS
testimonials.description: Come see what all these individuals have to say about me!

testimonials.title: UI/UX Developer
testimonials.quotes: Warren's programming expertise is exceptional. His knack for problem-solving and dedication to writing clean, efficient code is truly impressive. His efficiency with which he designs his websites is simply put impressive.

testimonials.title: Lecturer
testimonials.quotes: Warren is an outstanding learner in the classroom. His enthusiasm for learning, coupled with his quick grasp of new concepts, makes him a standout student. He demonstrates an impressive ability to absorb and apply knowledge effectively.

testimonials.title: Software Developer
testimonials.quotes: I highly recommend Warren Jaftha as a software developer. Their technical expertise, commitment to quality, and strong communication skills make him an asset to any team. I look forward to the opportunity to work with him again in the future.

testimonials.title: Designer
testimonials.quotes: Warren has a exceptional logical mindset,which is a fundamental asset for programming. I admire Warren's ability to approach challenges methodically and solve problems with precision, indicating a promising future in the field of coding.

testimonials.title: Front-End Developer
testimonials.quotes: Warren is a phenom. He is the guy that is guaranteed to bring both the skills and the passion to anything he puts his mind to. He always looks to motivate others to level up and achieve their true potential.

testimonials.title: Back-End Developer
testimonials.quotes: Warren's way of applying logic is exceptionally unique and he is capable of applying his logical way of thinking to everything thing he encounters whether it be in the world outside of work or at work.
